data.name: Seven Dwarfs: Legends Untold
data.detailed_description:
"Seven Dwarfs: Legends Untold" is an epic co-op roguelike built around action-packed gameplay with fast-paced combat. In teams, you will dive into the world of the Seven Dwarfs and defeat the scheming queen's evil plans that threaten Snow White and her lands. Each dwarf is a unique character with exciting mechanics and skills that evolve throughout the game. Each play-through takes you on a different procedurally-generated journey as you progress through a series of different biomes towards the final battle.

SAVE THE WORLD FROM EVIL

The empire has fallen into the hands of an evil queen. Now you, your friends and Snow White are the only remaining hope to restore the balance of power. As you play one of the seven dwarfs, your group will fight enemies and conquer new lands until evil is defeated. Every time you fail, Snow White's powers bring you back from the brink of death to once again face the perils of the ever-changing lands.

EXPLORE A NEW WORLD

On your travels through a series of biomes your group will face new types of enemies and bosses. Move from chamber to chamber and clear the way for Snow White as you go.

UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTER

Discover a wide range of weapon and skill upgrades to build your characters through Snow White's enchantments. Thousands of unique combinations ensure no run will ever be the same.

COUCH CO-OP WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Experience a world designed to bring you and up to three friends together in an epic fight. Harness the individual skills of your team members to work together in complex assaults on the enemy.

data.short_description: Seven Dwarfs: Legends Untold is a co-op action roguelike where, in teams of up to four, players dive into the world of the Seven Dwarfs and aim to save Snow White from her unenviable fate by fending off enemies and defeating the forces of evil.
